actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit against the tax imposed on interest on savings.

summary.text: Allows an income tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code of an amount equal to the interest on savings received during the taxable year . Limits such tax credit to $150.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit against the tax imposed on interest on savings.
